thread.title: 7/11 is selling breakfast pizza featuring eggs, cream gravy and a biscuit crust
thread.title_full: 7/11 is selling breakfast pizza featuring eggs, cream gravy and a biscuit crust

author: Chloe Bryan
title: 7/11 is selling breakfast pizza featuring eggs, cream gravy and a biscuit crust
text:
Whether it's a cold fridge slice or a hot egg-and-cheese concoction, pizza for breakfast is nothing new. Now, 7/11 is capitalizing on your love for handheld triangle food with a breakfast pizza of its own.
According to the Associated Press , the new item has a biscuit crust and is topped with bacon, sausage, ham, scrambled eggs, cheese and cream gravy — the perfect recipe for delighted taste buds and a churning stomach.
SEE ALSO: This digestive tracker can help you control your farts
And so far, at least a few humans seem to enjoy it. For example, here is a video review — a positive one — that contains the phrase "salty gravy load."
A video posted by Eric (@poweredbyicecream) on Jan 16, 2017 at 5:51am PST
Do you dare taste the magic for yourself? Visit your local 7/11. Pro tip: get a coffee or a morning Slurpee to wash it down.
BONUS: NBD, just a massive alligator out for a stroll
